mailgun_failed_load_api_key: Polish: Failed to load MailGun API key.
mailgun_failed_load_domain: Polish: Failed to load MailGun domain.
mailgun_error_send_email: Polish: Error in sending confirmation email,user registration failed
confirmation_already_confirmed: Polish: Registration has already been confirmed.
confirmation_resend_fail: Polish: Internal server error. Failed to resend confirmation email.
item_name_exists: Polish: An item with name '{}' already exists.
item_error_inserting: Polish: An error occurred while inserting the item.
store_name_exists: Polish: A store with name '{}' already exists.
store_error_inserting: Polish: An error occurred while inserting the store.
user_username_exists: Polish: A user with that username already exists.
user_email_exists: Polish: A user with that email already exists.
user_not_confirmed: Polish: You have not confirmed registration, please check your email <{}>
user_error_creating: Polish: Internal server error. Failed to create user
user_registered: Polish: Account created successfully, an email with an activation link has been sent. Please check your email.
image_delete_failed: Polish: Internal server error. Cannot delete image.
avatar_delete_failed: Polish: Internal server error! Failed to delete avatar.
